Module kivakit.ui.desktop
Package com.telenav.kivakit.ui.swing.graphics.drawing

Interface DrawingSurface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CoordinateSystem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AwtDrawingSurface
    public interface DrawingSurface
extends CoordinateSystem
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.awt.Shape drawBox​(Style style, DrawingPoint at, DrawingSize size)
      Draws a rectangle at the given point, with the given width and height, in the given style.
      java.awt.Shape drawCircle​(Style style, DrawingPoint at, DrawingDistance radius)
      Draws a circle at the given point with the given radius in the given style
      java.awt.Shape drawLine​(Style style, DrawingPoint from, DrawingPoint to)
      Draws a line from one point to another in the given style
      java.awt.Shape drawPath​(Style style, java.awt.geom.Path2D path)
      Draws a path in the given style
      java.awt.Shape drawText​(Style style, DrawingPoint at, java.lang.String text)
      Draws the given text, in the given style, at the given point (relative to the upper left)
      DrawingSize size​(Style style, java.lang.String text)
